QuoteLineItemRelatedObject.name: QuoteLineItemRelatedObject
QuoteLineItemRelatedObject.description: Represents the junction between a Quote Line Item and a related object. The values of the attributes from the related object are referenced by the relevant product attributes on the Quote LIne Item

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the quote line item related object record.

QuoteLineItemId.description: The quote line item associated with the record of the related object.

RelatedRecordIdentifier.description: The identifier of the record that's used to get the details of the quote line item.

RelatedRecordObjectName.description: The name of the object associated with the related record.

UsageType.description: The name of the object associated with the related record.
